bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully manipulated women's tubing, smooth weld, hydroformed alloy SS w/ In-Zerts, women's endurance geometry, 1-1/8" integrated HS, rack eyelets

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon legs, alloy crown/steerer, Zertz inserts
1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Specialized EliteSet, 3D forged alloy, 12-degree, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized Women's Comp, alloy, shallow drop
Specialized Roubaix wrap w/ 2.5 gel pads
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Espoir Sport w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, wire bead, 700x25c
Specialized Espoir Sport w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, wire bead, 700x25c
Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
